name: Stained Teeth
description: Your teeth are like your laundry: The right approach will remove many   stains. Foods, medications, tobacco, and trauma are some of the things that can discolor your teeth.

name: Cavities
description: These little holes in your teeth are bad news. You get them when a sticky bacteria, called plaque, builds up on your teeth, slowly destroying the hard outer shell, called enamel.

name: Chipped Tooth
description: It's the No. 1 type of dental injury. An accident can cause a chip. So can something much less dramatic, like chomping popcorn.

name: Impacted Teeth
description: An adult tooth that doesn't come in properly is impacted. It usually happens when a tooth is stuck against another tooth, bone, or soft tissue.

name: Cracked Tooth
description: You were playing football without a mouth guard, or chewing, or maybe you don’t know how it happened, but now you’ve got a cracked molar.

name: Sensitive to Cold
description: Ice cream should taste good, not make you wince when the cold hits your teeth. The first step is to find the cause.

name: Hyperdontia
description: How many teeth are in your mouth? If you’re like most people, you had 20 primary, or “baby,” teeth, and you now have 32 adult teeth.

name: Crooked Teeth
description: The fix -- orthodontia -- isn’t just for kids. And straightening crooked teeth and aligning your bite doesn’t just make for a prettier smile.

name: Gap Between Teeth
description: You may not consider a gap between the front teeth a problem at all. Famous people who sport the look include singer Madonna

name: Gum Problems
description: Do your gums bleed easily? Are they tender? Do you notice them pulling away from your teeth? You might have gum disease (gingivitis).

name: Grinding Teeth
description: Teeth grinding, or bruxism, can wear teeth down over time. It is most often caused by stress and sleeping habits.

name: Broken Tooth
description: Dental Treatments for a broken, cracked or chipped tooth will depend on how bad the damage is.
